main event: A UFO sighting reported by a civilian observer in Speicher, Germany on June 7, 1960.
interesting points: The observer described the object as smaller, about 1-1.2 m in size, greenish fluorescent, and descending at a 45-degree angle., The object appeared to have a fast dark brown and red body., The sighting duration lasted approximately 8-10 seconds., The observer was a reliable German national employed as a technical translator at the base., The weather conditions during the sighting were very clear with a full moon and starry sky.
sighted object: smaller shaped object with greenish fluorescent shimmer
witness description: civilian male, German national, technical translator employed by the base
